title: Apple details how Google Workspace will integrate with Apple Business Manager
content:
A few weeks ago, Apple announced it would integrate Apple Business Essentials with Google Workspace. Now, the Cupertino company has offered new details into how the Google Workspace integration will work within Apple Business Manager.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple details how Google Workspace will integrate with Apple Business Manager appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has released new details into the Google Workspace integration with Apple Business Manager for small businesses.
